channel.title: 317 pi shop problem wont trade or anything?

item.title: 317 pi shop problem wont trade or anything?
item.dc:creator: @tha_nickscape_guy tha nickscape guy
item.description:
@tha_nickscape_guy wrote:

I’m not sure, but have you added the WanneShop thing it should look like this…

} else if (NPCID == 3210) { // noobshop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop =72; // noobshop
The…

WanneShop =72;

… is your shops id so replace it with ur shops id (just choose a number ;)).

} else if (NPCID == 3210) {

replace 3210 with ur npc id
after that you go to shops.cfg and add the shod id to it and the items ;).
[size=12pt]Hope I helped! ;D.[/size]

Read full topic
